text: Gözümün önünde büyüyüp serpilen kızımı bile fark edememişim
english: I didn't even notice my daughter growing up right in front of me.

text: Obaya döndüğümde bir de baktım ki
english: Next thing I know, I'm back in the Oba.

text: kızım büyümüş, serpilmiş kocaman gelinlik kız olmuş
english: My daughter grew up to be a big, grown-up dress girl.
It won't be easy for me to get used to it.
That's what they're talking about.
If the Goncagül migrates with you
I'll be all alone

text: Her vakit otağımızda yeriniz vardır Gümüştekin Bey'im
english: There's always room for you in our tent Mr. Silver

text: Obaya geldiğinizde sizden nefret eder olmuştuk
english: We hated you when you came to the office.
But now we're related
You're part of the family now.
Thanks.

text: O sizin gönlünüzün yüceliğindendir Hayme Hatun. Eyvallah
english: She is of the glory of your hearts, Hayme Hatun.

text: Hem belki Kayıların başına gelen bu felaket
english: And maybe it's a disaster that happened to the Apricots.

text: iki obanın birleşmesi için hayırlı olmuştur
english: It's been good for the merger of two obas.
Every word you say

text: Kayı'nın ve Dodurga'nın bir araya gelmesine dem vurursunuz
english: You'll make sure that Kayi and Dodurga get back together.

text: Gümüştekin Bey'im, biz kış için kader birliği ettik
english: Master in silver, we are destined for winter
Don't make a big deal out of this brotherhood.

text: Oğuzların en yiğit Alplerinin olduğu iki obayız
english: We're two octoms with the bravest Alps of all Oğuz

text: Birlikteliğimiz neden daim olmasın Hayme Hatun?
english: Why can't we be together forever, Hayme Hatun?

text: Moğol zulmünün getirdiği bu kader birliği
english: This union of fate brought by Mongolian tyranny

text: kim bilir, belki bizi uç beyliğine taşıyacak hayırlı bir kısmet olur
english: Who knows, maybe it'll be a good fortune to lead us to the flight master.
To Seljuk State.

text: Sultanımız Alaeddin'e bağlı bir uç beyliği dersiniz
english: You'd say it's a flyman of our Sultan Alaeddin.
Isn't that right, Mr. Silver?
Of course, Hayme Hatun.

text: Kayı'nın gücü kimseye eyvallah etmemesinden gelir
english: Kai's power comes from not letting anyone down.

text: Ola ki kim bu ham hayalin peşinden gider
english: But who goes after this raw dream?

text: kimlere eyvallah dediğini şimdiden görür gibiyim
english: I can already see who you're good to.
As-salaam-alaikum-salaam-salaam-salaam-salaam-salaam-salaam-salaam-salaam-salaam-salaam-salaam-salaam.
Mr. Gündüz
Here you go, Goncagül Hatun.

text: Sizin gibi bir yiğidi karşıma çıkarttığı için
english: For bringing me a hero like you
May you know that I thank Almighty God

text: Ben de senin gibi halden anlayan
english: I don't know what you're talking about.

text: dilinin ayarı olan bir kadın çıkarttığı için şükrederim
english: I'm just thankful that a woman with a tune of her tongue was able to pull it out.
Thank you, too.
God rest your soul, sir.
You, too.
Oh, my God, you're making me up.

text: Gündoğdu Bey'imi de o şirret avradın şerrinden koru
english: Protect Mr. Gündüz from the evil of that bitch
What am I gonna do?
You'd fight with your shadow, girl.

text: Ben sana ne diyeyim? Allah akıl fikir versin sana
english: What can I tell you?
Everybody's gone, Ma.
He's gone, son.
Come and sit down.

text: Ee ana, de bakalım; dünürünle gelinini iyice tartıp biçtin mi?
english: So, mother, tell me, have you weighed your daughter-in-law well?

text: Gümüştekin, Selçuklu Sarayı'nda önemli makamlara gelmiş
english: The silver has come to the high places of Seljuk's Palace.
He's a man of reputation.

text: Bize olan saygısı da yerli yerinde
english: And his respect for us is in order.

text: Goncagül kızımın terbiyesi de beni fazlasıyla memnun eder
english: Goncagül, my daughter's manners please me greatly.

text: Bir ana da oğlu için en fazla ne ister değil mi?
english: Isn't that what a mother wants for her son?
Thanks, Mom.
But

text: Gümüştekin sarayın havasını fazlaca koklamış biri
english: Someone who smelled the air of the palace in silver
We saw it in Aleppo.

text: O sarayın kiri pası insanın gözüne perde gibi iner de
english: The rust of that palace falls like a curtain to a man's eye.
He doesn't see what he needs to see.

text: Senin gözlerin de her daim açık olsun
english: And keep your eyes open at all times.
Ertuğrul
Welcome.
We welcome you, Mother.
Welcome, brother.
We welcome you, brother.

text: Oğul, yorgun görünürsün. Karnın aç mı? Bir şeyler hazırlayayım hemen
english: Son, you look tired. Are you hungry? I'll fix you something.
No, ma'am.
I have something to tell you.
Why don't you sit down?

text: Noyan, Abdurrahman'ı kullanıp bize tuzak kurmak ister
english: Noyan wants to use Abdurrahman to set us up.
Did he find out about Abdurrahman?

text: Sen de onu kendi tuzağıyla vurmak istersin
english: You want to shoot him with your own trap.

text: Gayrı kanadı kırık kuş gibi kaçmak yoktur ağabey
english: There's no running away like a bird with a broken wing, brother.
What are we gonna do?

text: Gayrı dilde söz, yürekte sabır kalmamıştır
english: In a different language, there's no patience left in the heart.
I say we cut what the tongue can't cut with a sword.
♪ I say it's time to fight ♪

text: Yani Noyan'ın karargâhına saldıralım mı dersin?
english: So you think we should attack Noyan's headquarters?
What do you think, sunshine?
My brother tells the truth.

text: Belli ki Noyan'ı iki koldan birden vurmak ister
english: He obviously wants to shoot Noyan in both arms.

text: Hem kurduğu tuzaklarla hem de karargâhıyla
english: With his traps and his headquarters
That's what I say, brother.

text: O vakit bir an evvel beylerle konuşup ikna edelim
english: Then let's talk to the gentlemen and convince them.

text: İkna edelim ki iki oba bir olduğunda
english: Let's convince him that when two ocoes are one,
Let's show the world what we can do.
At the hotel where Itemday will set you up

text: şerefli bir komutan olma fırsatı verdim
english: I gave him the opportunity to be an honorable commander.

text: Sana cihanın tüm nimetlerini altın tepside sundum
english: I offered you all the blessings of the jihad on a golden platter
What did you do?
You betrayed me, Abdurrahman.
To me, to Noyan.

text: Senin de, cihan imparatorluğunun da canı cehenneme
english: To hell with you and your jihan empire.
You son of a bitch!
Ah!

text: Ertuğrul'un da! Onun da kellesini obalarının girişine asacağım
english: I'll hang his head at the entrance of his obas.
